# Gobinath Mallaiyan

> Technical Program Manager with 23+ years building scalable systems in Healthcare & Enterprise Technology

## Summary
Seasoned Technical Program Manager with over two decades of expertise in steering digital transformation, cloud architecture, and AI/ML initiatives. Currently at Tata Consultancy Services, delivering enterprise solutions for Fortune 500 clients across healthcare, pharma, and technology sectors. I bridge the gap between complex engineering challenges and strategic business objectives.

## Current Role
- Title: Technical Program Manager
- Organization: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
- Client: Johnson & Johnson
- Location: Toronto, Canada
- Since: 2021

## Key Facts
- 23+ years of professional experience
- 14+ roles held across career
- 11+ professional certifications
- 10+ years in Healthcare & Pharma (Johnson & Johnson, Pfizer)
- 19+ years in Enterprise Technology

## Industry Expertise
- Healthcare & Pharma: Regulatory Compliance, HIPAA, FDA Guidelines, Clinical Systems
- Enterprise Technology: Global Delivery, Platform Modernization, Digital Transformation
- Life Sciences: Content Platforms, Multilingual Systems, Enterprise CMS

## Leadership Philosophy
"I don't lead from above â€” I lead beside. I mentor, share, and build shoulder-to-shoulder with my teams."

Principles:
- People-First: Great leadership is about empowerment, not control
- Lead by Example: Jump in where needed, ensure no one is left behind
- Servant Leadership: Teaching, mentoring, and evolving with the team

## Community & Mentoring

- Active Student Mentor (2022-Present): Guiding CS students to deployment-ready professionals

## What Drives Me
